titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to add Nicholas and Robertson Counties, Kentucky, to the Appalachian region.
To amend title 40, United States Code, to add Nicholas and Robertson Counties, Kentucky, to the Appalachian region.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Development, Public Buildings and Emergency Management.

committee.name: House Transportation and Infrastructure
committee.subcommittee: Economic Development, Public Buildings, and Emergency Management

bill.summary: Amends Federal law to add Nicholas and Robertson Counties, Kentucky, to the Appalachian region.
